divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my patio ona beautifly clear day, when I noticed some high flying birds. As iwas watching the birds I noticed off in the distance a star like object but it was broad daylight. As I watched it had a very peculiar movement pattern. So I rushed inside to grab my video camera. I filmed the object for close to five minuets before I lost sight of the object, witch was moving in a general north to south direction. This is the second day in a row to see the same object and I did capture it both days on video..I know that it was not a plane, or bird, or balloon, or helicopter, the only thing I could speculate was that it was a sattelite..The video is very shakey, but when it is paused one can make out the object to a certin degree..I do not know how to up load the video.But I sure wish that some one could take a look at it because I am curious as to what it might be!
Summary: Bright rectangular shape..Like a wrist watch, bright reflectiveand round in the middle darkrectangular on top and bottom..
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around September 6th 2011
